item.title: 3 detainees shot, some fatally, at Dallas ICE facility: Sources
item.description: At least three people were shot at the Dallas Immigration and Customs Enforcement field office on Wednesday morning.

item.title: Kremlin says Russia is not a 'paper tiger' after Trump criticism
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy praised his “productive meeting” with U.S. President Donald Trump on the sidelines of the United Nations Gener...

item.title: WATCH: Huge chunk of ice breaks of glacier and crashes into ocean
item.description: Eyewitness video captured a large chunk of ice breaking off in spectacular fashion from the Bruggen Glacier in southern Chile.

item.title: WATCH: Floodwaters crash through hotel doors in Hong Kong
item.description: Video circulating online shows the dramatic moment floodwaters smash through the doors of a hotel in Hong Kong.
